mapper.insert:
insert into N_WF_USER_DONE (INSTANCE_ID, NODE_ID, USER_ID, START_TIME, USER_NAME, LAST_USER_ID, LAST_USER_NAME, END_TIME) values
(#{item.instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from N_WF_USER_TODO t where t.instance_id = #{instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
